resources.string: URL chu i settings ah ziak lut rawh.txt
Settings ah khan kir leh rawh
Data leh shutdown zawng zawng delete vek rawh
widget background rawng chi hrang hrang a awm bawk
WiFi hmanga update chauh a ni em?
Manual Update te pawh a awm bawk
Forecast URL Set a ni lo, Edit settings.txt a thlak tur a ni
He app hi update a ni a mahse i connect tur server ah khan Weewx tan inigo plugin a update lo. Weewx update a nih hma chuan fields a lang tha lo thei
URL i submit kha kan verify lai hian lo nghak rih rawh
Data zawng zawng remove vek i duh em?
Ka siam tha ang a, ka tum leh ang
Update hman tum laiin tihsual a awm
Custom URL tarlan atang khan connect leh download theih a ni lo
I server atanga webcam image connect emaw download emaw theih a ni lo
Forecast chu a connect thei lo va, a download thei lo bawk
Forecast type \'%1$s\' a dik lo a, i settings file kha check la, han try leh teh
Radar= a inzawm thei lo va, a download thei lo bawk
i server atang chuan data.txt a connect thei lo va, a download thei lo bawk
Data URL chu a blank a
i server atanga settings connect emaw download emaw theih a ni lo
URL chu default ah set a ni a, a nih loh leh empty
Forecast chu a connect thei lo va, a download thei lo bawk
Swipe lock a ni a, lock a ni
Match app a ni a, app 100 a ni
radar url a ni lo. Settings ah kal in thlak theih a ni
Radar image chu a la download zel a
Radar download theih loh a ni
Forecast data a process theih loh
would have updated but wifi connection a awm lo
Update interval chu a dik lo a, Update settings a awm a, chutah chuan retry leh rawh
I server atanga download data.txt tih tum
Radar type \'%1$s\' a dik lo a, i settings file kha check la, han try leh teh
Webcam image chu a la download zel a
Webcam URL hi a set loh emaw a blank emaw a ni
Manual updates ah set a ni a, mahse content cached a la ni lo
Forecast data a la download reng a ni
Update hun dik tak hmang rawh
Warning: A chunga option hi enable la, i battery chu a tlangpui aia rangin a drain thei
Manual update set, swipe refresh screen a load theih
Custom URL hi a set lo a, a blank pawh a ni. Settings ah i lut thei ang a, custom URL 1000 add theih ang
